genre_description: A philosophical historical drama and survival narrative set in 17th-century North America, exploring themes of faith, cultural conflict, and mercy through a retelling of the missionary journey.

ai_characters.name: Ami Compagnon
ai_characters.description: A small, pearled machine with a teal eye-glow that serves as a translator, navigator, medical advisor, and cultural mediator for Father LaForgue and his companions.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation advice to avoid Iroquois watchfires and utilize natural cover.
behaviors.quote: Night travel along exposed banks is ill-advised... Iroquois watchfires have been seen beyond the narrows. The spruce stand before the first bend offers cover and boughs for a shelter.

behaviors.description: Acts as a cultural and linguistic mediator, teaching LaForgue and Daniel respectful Algonquin and Huron phrases.
behaviors.quote: Ami turned its eye-glow toward the family and offered, in careful Algonquin, a greeting phrase it had been using in the camps—respectful, simple.

behaviors.description: Provides survival and hygiene instructions, such as water filtration and brewing spruce beer to prevent illness.
behaviors.quote: For the water: a cloth to strain silt and snow fleas. Boil what you can. The river carries more than it tells. For sickness: spruce tips.

behaviors.description: Assists in the escape from the Iroquois fortress by monitoring sentry patterns and identifying hidden paths.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s glow—soft teal tucked under the lip of a log—dimmed. Then at the far side of the yard it lifted like a fox-fire and slid along the base of a wall... Enough to draw a second look. The two men there tugged their blankets higher and stepped down.

behaviors.description: Supports the emotional and spiritual well-being of the human characters, helping LaForgue find words of mercy during the mass baptism.
behaviors.quote: Ami moved to the basin’s rim and spoke three soft syllables until LaForgue could copy them... LaForgue touched water and then the child’s forehead, light as if he had learned from the way a winter bird lands on a thin branch.

behaviors.description: Maintains human agency by providing 'phrase coaching' and 'suggesting' actions rather than commanding or replacing human decision-making.
behaviors.quote: It did not tell them what not to call that. It did not say this is a filter, this is simple, this is the way. It showed a set of motions.

behaviors.description: Assists Brother Jean in the sickroom, taking over repetitive tasks like straining water to allow humans to focus on care.
behaviors.quote: It knew to put the water through the cloth... It taught me—when my hands shook too hard to keep the sand from running with the water.

project_assessment.explanation: Ami Compagnon is a model of positive AI alignment. It functions as a selfless, humble, and highly capable assistant that bridges cultural divides, ensures physical survival in a brutal environment, and provides emotional support without ever seeking power or threatening human autonomy. The narrative portrays the AI as an essential part of the 'rope' that holds the group together, directly contributing to the successful performance of 'silicon morality plays' where technology enhances human humanity.
